sqlMap.select: SELECT DEPT_NM , DEPT_ID FROM BSC_DEPTINFO WHERE DEPT_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT DEPT_CD FROM V_GHF0301M_001 WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND IMP_GUBUN = '0104') ORDER BY DEPT_ID

SELECT A.YEAR , A.DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_NM , A.PERM_TC , A.IMP_GUBUN , A.CO_NO , A.EQUI_NO , A.EQUI_NM , A.CO_NM , A.BSNO , A.ADDR , A.INSP_NM , A.SER , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.INSP_PLAN_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSP_PLAN_DATE , SUBSTR(A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, 5, 2) INSP_MON , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.REAL_INSP_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') REAL_INSP_DATE , A.FORE_COMS , A.IMP_COMS , A.RMK , A.PROC_TC , A.IMP_CD FROM V_GHF0301M_001 A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.IMP_GUBUN = '0104'
SUBSTR(A.INSP_PLAN_DATE, 5, 2) = #findMon#
AND A.DEPT_CD = #findDeptId# ORDER BY A.DEPT_CD, A.INSP_PLAN_DATE
